title: Genesis Chapter 20 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 20 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What did Abraham do in Genesis 20:17?
options: Healed Abimelech, and his wife, and his maidservants
Built an altar to the Lord
questions.correctAnswer: Healed Abimelech, and his wife, and his maidservants
questions.explanation: Genesis 20:17 states: "So Abraham prayed unto God: and God healed Abimelech, and his wife, and his maidservants; and they bare children."

questions.question: According to Genesis 20:2, who said of Sarah his wife?
questions.explanation: Genesis 20:2 states: "And Abraham said of Sarah his wife, She is my sister: and Abimelech king of Gerar sent, and took Sarah."

questions.question: Who said "of Sarah his wife, She is my sister: and Abimelech king of Gerar sent, and to..." in Genesis 20:2?
questions.explanation: Genesis 20:2 states: "And Abraham said of Sarah his wife, She is my sister: and Abimelech king of Gerar sent, and took Sarah."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 20:1: "And ______ journeyed from thence toward the south country, and dwelled between Kadesh and Shur, and sojourned in Gerar."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Abraham journeyed from thence toward the south country, and dwelled between Kadesh and Shur, and sojourned in Gerar."
